title: As it was
creator_credit: Annemarie Szeleczky and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: In this short animated student film a woman reflects back on her childhood in Hungary and the circumstances that led to her family becoming refugees in Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Annemarie Szeleczky and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
